title: Low Priority
body: Can you Please make the 20min ban stay the same even if you leave or accidentally leave just like if you were not in a 20min ban but instead a 5min ban. Because you have to wait a whole new 20min and its just extremely annoying please fix problem or find an alternative. Like say making the time stay the same even if you leave. Or explaining the point of making the time restart all over to me and I will come to understand because I dont understand and I dont see the reason why you would make it start all over again.

replies.body: Awesome I didn't think you would actually answer, thank you so much for giving feed back i will do what you said and hopefully you will heed some one my ideas.
